mapper.insert: insert into test_status (test_id, student_id, status, solved, correct, flagged, score, updated_date, exam_started_count, device, device_info, latitude, longitude) values(${test.id}, ${student.id}, '${requestType}', ${test.solvedCount}, ${test.correctCount}, ${test.flaggedCount}, ${test.score}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 1 , '${test.device}', '${test.deviceInfo}', '${test.locationLat}', '${test.locationLong}');
mapper.update:
update test_status set
solved = ${test.solvedCount},
correct = ${test.correctCount},
score = ${test.score},
latitude = '${test.locationLat}',
longitude = '${test.locationLong}',
updated_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, exam_started_count = exam_started_count + 1 where test_id = ${test.id} AND student_id = ${student.id}

update test_status set
solved = ${test.solvedCount},
correct = ${test.correctCount},
score = ${test.score},
evaluation_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, where test_id = ${test.id} AND student_id = ${student.id}
update test_status set random_sequence = '${randomSequence}' where test_id = ${test.id} AND student_id = ${student.id}
update test_result set marks = ${marks} where test_id = ${test} AND student_id = ${student} AND question_id = ${question}
mapper.insert: insert into test_result (marks, test_id, student_id, question_id, option_selected, flagged) values(${marks}, ${test}, ${student}, ${question}, '${answered}', ${flagged})

insert into test (test_name, no_of_questions, total_marks, duration, status, institute_id, package_id, created_date, start_date, end_date, test_ui, show_result) values ('${test.name}', ${test.noOfQuestions}, ${test.totalMarks} , ${test.duration}, 'Active', ${student.currentPackage.institute.id}, ${student.currentPackage.id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '${testEndDateString}', '${test.testUi}', 'Y')
